description: Charred eggplant adds a delicious smokiness to this Mediterranean salad, perfect for a summer picnic or BBQ.
name: Grilled Eggplant & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan on medium heat. Use remaining oil to brush both sides of eggplant. Chargrill for 3-4 minutes on both sides or until charred and tender. Arrange eggplant on a platter. Top with tomato, feta and extra herbs, and serve drizzled with dressing.
